import pandas as pd
from glob import glob

df = pd.read_csv('../input/titanic/train.csv')

source.36cdaf52:
# %%time
from pandas_profiling import ProfileReport

auto_eda = ProfileReport(df, title="Titanic - Machine Learning from Disaster", explorative=True, minimal=False, progress_bar=False) 

# BUGFIX: https://github.com/pandas-profiling/pandas-profiling/issues/493
auto_eda.to_notebook_iframe()
